forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 60. West wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As the morning sun begins its ascent, a delicate veil of patchy drizzle has already kissed the streets of Downtown San Francisco, whispering tales of the night past. The clouds are beginning to part, revealing a mostly sunny sky that will embrace the city, promising a day where temperatures hover near a pleasant 68 degrees. The slight breeze from the west brings refreshment and could cast a few playful gusts, perfect for those venturing outside. The marine layer is dissipating, retreating with the tides as the clearer skies awaken aspirations of exploration.

Tonight, as the sun bows out gracefully, the climate will serenade you with a gentle clarity, with the temperature settling around a comfortable 60. A pull from the west will maintain a briskness in the air, urging you to wear light layers—perhaps a soft cardigan or a lightweight jacket to accompany your wanderings. As the leisurely hours roll on, this sublime weather beckons you to take a simple stroll along the Embarcadero, pausing to savor a moment with a cup of coffee, or perhaps to catch a live performance in one of the city’s charming parks. The day is inviting, a canvas waiting for you to paint your memories upon it.
